# Sitno, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Sitno  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Olsztynek, within Olsztyn County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  south of Olsztynek and  south-west of the regional capital Olsztyn.
